alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 1:14PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleveland, western Gaston, northwestern York and northeastern Cherokee Counties through 145 PM EST... At 113 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Shelby, or near Grover, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Kings Mountain, Cherryville, Bessemer City, Blacksburg, Grover, Patterson Springs, Fallston, Waco and Earl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Conditions are favorable for development of a very brief, weak tornado. Be prepared to take immediate action if a tornado is sighted or a Tornado Warning is issued.
